name: spring-data-rest-js
description: js lib for java spring data rest service,work for node.js and browser,use fetch API

scripts.browser: cp spring.js dist/spring-data-rest.js & uglifyjs dist/spring-data-rest.js -o dist/spring-data-rest.min.js --source-map dist/spring-data-rest.min.js.map -p 5 -c -m
